full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI CHOS SKOR LAS, BTZAN MDOS GTONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(BTZAN MDOS GDONG TSUL DREGS PA MIG BSGYUR GYI LTAD MO ZHES BYA BA'I 'DI YANG DUR BED NAS DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA NANG SO BSKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS AU TSUGS MTHAR SKYIL GYIS BSKUL YANG NGO MA BZLOG PAR LHA 'DRE STONG GI 'DRA BA LAS, 'BYUNG BA DANG SGO BSTUN KU S'A LI ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS NOR SKYONG RAB BRGAL TSUL TSUL DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI KU SHRI NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'PHEL GYIS BGYIS PA RES MED YONGS LA PHAN THOGS PAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE BA 'PHEL 'GYUR CIG ,DGE'O LEGS SO, ,)
